name: Simon (Flat Games)
description:
Simon is a small game made with LÖVE, as an attempt at #devtober challenge proposed by Twitter user @ThisIsEllian: by the end of October, make some game, post its progress, and make $1 from it. This game is provided free of charge, but feel free to donate us if you like and help us complete the said challenge.

Currently the game has 12 levels to explore.

Plan for next update: more levels, more background colors.

Android version is coming soon.
